page.title: 12Local Pub Games
page.content: {Table Skittles} The Arnold Arms, George and Red Lion all have table skittles. Each player has three cheeses to throw. There are nine skittles to aim at. If you knock all the skittles down with one or two throws then they are put up again and you still finish your three goes. Although there are only nine skittles a good player will sometimes score 14 or 15. The skittles are on a specially designed table. There is a big net behind and a little on the sides. The sides are also padded. {Darts} There are darts teams in all the pubs. The W.I. have a ladies team in Kilsby. After the match proper sometimes all of one team play 1001 aganst all of the other. The loosing team buys the beer for the winners.
